name: Manufactorium Academia Vol1
description:
Manufactorium Academia Vol1 is a choose-your-own-adventure story using RPGMaker with 15 possible unique endings. The emphasis on jump scares and fright are intentionally reduced to emphasize modern and surreal horror.

The universe is set in a too-likely future that is completely controlled by the Manufactorium. It is an era when not only do people use machines manufacture goods, but people use machines to manufacture humans as well.

Or maybe you're British or German... where this too-likely future is reality.
